Sentencas: Nickel nanoparticles loaded on the electron-protonmixed conductor BaCe(0.5)Zr(0.3-x)Y(0.2)NixO(3-delta) (Ni/BCZYN, x = 0 and 0.03) were synthesized for use in the hydrogen electrode of a proton-conducting solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC).
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: The Ni nanoparticles, synthesized by an impregnation method, were from 45.8 nm to 84.1 nm in diameter, and were highly dispersed on the BCZYN.
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: The BCZYN nanoparticles, fabricated by the flame oxide synthesis method, constructed a unique microstructure, the so-called fused-aggregate network structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: The BCZYN nanoparticles have capability of constructing a scaffold for the hydrogen electrode with both electronically conducting pathways and gas diffusion pathways.
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: The catalytic activity on Ni/BCZYN (x = 0 and 0.03) catalyst layers (CLs) improved with the circumference length of the Ni nanoparticles.
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the catalytic activity on the Ni/BCZYN (x = 0.03) CL was higher than that of the Ni/BCZYN (x = 0) CL.
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: BCZYN (x = 0.03) possesses higher electronic conductivity than BCZYN (x = 0) due to the Ni doping, resulting in an enlarged effective reaction zone (ERZ).
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: We conclude that the proton reduction reaction in the ERZ was the rate-determining step on the hydrogen electrode, and the reaction was enhanced by improving the electronic conductivity of the electron-proton mixed conductor BCZYN.
Titulo: Synthesis and Evaluation of Ni Catalysts Supported on BaCe0.5Zr0.3-xY0.2NixO3-δ with Fused- Aggregate Network Structure for the Hydrogen Electrode of Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell
